about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Delicious Dungeon, created by Irene Chan with the input of Digital Cauldron.

This soundtrack includes all of the music used in the game, as well as two extra tracks that are planned to be used in the future.

The soundtrack is very varied and takes you on a journey through the game, with different styles, tempos and emotions.
From the cozy and lovely music you hear in your home, to the mysterious music of the forest, to the exhilarating tracks of the bosses, that themselves are varied, the music transports you back to those unique moments.

Irene Chan is a very well versed musician with a lot of experience in the gaming industrie.
She has composed all of these tracks based on descriptions and art alone.
Her mastery translates to some amazing soundtracks that can not be compared.

This package contains 23 Soundtracks from the game, two bonus soundtracks, that total over 50 minutes of music.
